summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Caroline Avenue from North 88th Street to approximately 300 feet south thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16877 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
